citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC conducted its evaluations of the Program for Humane Care and Use of animals as well as a facility inspection
on December 5, 2024, however a report of the evaluations was not submitted to the Institutional Official (IO). The IACUC
must prepare reports of evaluations, and are to submit these reports to the IO as per this section of the AWA. The IACUC
must complete and submit a report to the IO of the evaluations at a minimum of at least once every 6 months.
******** To remain corrected from March 3, 2025 and that point forward
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC conducted its evaluations of the Program for Humane Care and Use of animals as well as a facility inspection 
on December 5, 2024, however a report of the evaluations was not submitted to the Institutional Official (IO). The IACUC 
must prepare reports of evaluations, and are to submit these reports to the IO as per this section of the AWA. The IACUC 
must complete and submit a report to the IO of the evaluations at a minimum of at least once every 6 months.  
 
******** To remain corrected from March 3, 2025 and that point forward 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
